t: Amazon.com: Amazon Autos FAQs: Amazon Autos
s: Amazon Autos is a partnership between participating local Hyundai dealerships and Amazon that allows you to browse and purchase or lease a car from a dealership through Amazon.com. Vehicles listed at Amazon Autos are sold or leased by participating local dealerships, not by Amazon.

t: Hyundai Motor: First auto brand available for purchase on Amazon Autos - KED Global
s: January 8, 2025 - Hyundai Motor America, the US affiliate of South Korea’s top automaker Hyundai Motor Co., said on Wednesday it is now selling cars directly on Amazon, including popular electric vehicles such as the 2025 model of the IONIQ 5, the IONIQ 6 sedan and the soon-to-be-launched IONIQ 9. t: Introducing Amazon Autos: Buy your next car on Amazon in 48 US cities
s: December 10, 2024 - Customers in 48 U.S. cities can buy new Hyundai vehicles from their local participating dealer directly on Amazon.

t: Auto Brand: Building Successful Car Brands for the Future: Parment, Anders: 9780749469290: Amazon.com: Books
s: Auto Brand provides a roadmap to branding and marketing success in the automotive industry from a leading industry expert, featuring case studies from major car brands including Audi, BMW, Holden, Mercedes-Benz, Opel, Porsche, Saab, Seat, Skoda, Vauxhall, Volkswagen, and Volvo.

t: CPSC Warns Consumers to Immediately Stop Using VESLA HOME Brand Kitchen Faucets Sold on Amazon.com Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children | CPSC.gov
s: WASHINGTON, D.C. – The U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC) is warning consumers to immediately stop using VESLA HOME brand kitchen faucets sold on Amazon.com. The faucets were tested and found to contain lead that can leach into water at levels that can be particularly harmful ...
